title: Bug 124570: Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session
description: Bug 124570 - Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session
OB: When clicking on the Preview button in the toolbar, the system always displays the Product Catalog report, regardless of which report was previously opened in the session.
EB: The system should display the Sales Invoice report when clicking on the Preview button, regardless of which report was previously opened in the session.
SR:
1. Open the Sales Invoice report. 
2. Click on the Preview button in the toolbar. 
3. Observe that the system displays the Product Catalog report instead of the Sales Invoice report.
